primitives.name: Namespace
primitives.definition: Canonical namespace for types/resources; stabilizes the ABI and prevents collisions.
primitives.notes: Used for namespacing di event_type, reason_code, contract_id.

primitives.name: Ref
primitives.definition: Canonical reference to a resource/artifact (URI-like) deterministically resolvable.
primitives.notes: Formato raccomandato: yai:<kind>:<ns>:<id>@<hash?>

primitives.name: Key
primitives.definition: Identity/key for signing or attestation; v1 may essere soft (fingerprint-only).
primitives.notes: Non obbligatoria for verify v1; utile for attestazioni future.

primitives.name: Hash
primitives.definition: Content identity (content-address) for immutability, deduplication and sealing.
primitives.notes: Hash è l’asse principale di integrità in bundle_manifest.

primitives.name: Artifact
primitives.definition: Materialized object (file/record) with ruolo, ref and hash; minimum unit of proof.
primitives.notes: Role standard: policy, decision_log, metrics, index, manifest, report.

primitives.name: Store
primitives.definition: Local store for artifacts indicizzato for ref/hash (network opzionale, non richiesto).
primitives.notes: Il verify MUST funzionare with store locale, senza rete.

primitives.name: Schema
primitives.definition: Shape contract versionato (JSON Schema) for artefatti normativi.
primitives.notes: Ogni artifact normativo MUST avere schema v1.

primitives.name: Validate
primitives.definition: Deterministic validation: schema + consistenza cross-file; fail-fast.
primitives.notes: È il gate di CI: non conforme => fail.

primitives.name: Clock
primitives.definition: Timestamping rules (wall/mono) and normalizzazione for ordinamento coerente.
primitives.notes: Per verify contano più ordine and linking that wall-time assoluto.

primitives.name: Record
primitives.definition: Append-only unit serializzata (json/jsonl) with header canonico (id/type/time/ref).
primitives.notes: Header raccomandato: record_id, record_type, ts, run_id, wave_id, refs[].

primitives.name: Timeline
primitives.definition: Ordered sequence and linkata di record with invarianti di continuità.
primitives.notes: Used to a verificare: decision precede effect, deny => applied=false, ecc.

primitives.name: Metric
primitives.definition: Typed measurement (value+unit+window) aggregabile and confrontabile.
primitives.notes: Le unità devono essere esplicite (bytes, count, ms, etc.).

primitives.name: Index
primitives.definition: Machine-readable inventory di artifacts (role→path/hash/ref).
primitives.notes: Indice = lista completa dei file that contano for verify.

primitives.name: Manifest
primitives.definition: Root document that descrive una collezione (bundle/wave/run) and i suoi hash.
primitives.notes: È la root of truth: se cambia, cambia il bundle.

primitives.name: Selector
primitives.definition: Deterministic rules for scegliere runs/evidence (publish set).
primitives.notes: Selector MUST essere serializzato nel bundle for ripetibilità.

primitives.name: Channel
primitives.definition: Emission channel controllato (stdout/stderr/log/eventbus) with formati stabili.
primitives.notes: Separa output umano da output normativo (jsonl).

primitives.name: Fingerprint
primitives.definition: Environment fingerprint (OS/toolchain/deps) for audit and comparabilità.
primitives.notes: Non sempre obbligatoria for verify, ma consigliata for rigore.

primitives.name: Versioning
primitives.definition: Regole di compatibilità and migrazioni; impedisce rotture silenziose.
primitives.notes: Classi suggerite: A=backward, B=minor break, C=hard break.

primitives.name: Path
primitives.definition: Canonical path normalizzato dentro una root dichiarata (anti path-traversal).

primitives.name: File
primitives.definition: Oggetto file with semantica di lettura/scrittura controllata and stat coerente.

primitives.name: Dir
primitives.definition: Directory with ordering deterministico for walk and treehash.

primitives.name: Stream
primitives.definition: Flusso di bytes/records with framing stabile (pipe-like).

primitives.name: Lock
primitives.definition: Mutual exclusion deterministica for risorse (build/verify).

primitives.name: Txn
primitives.definition: Unit atomica di aggiornamento for manifest/index/store.

primitives.name: Error
primitives.definition: Tipo errore standardizzato (code+class+message+context) for UX and CI.
primitives.notes: Codici MUST essere stabili and testabili.

primitives.name: Status
primitives.definition: Stato macchina di operazioni (pending/running/done/failed) persistibile.

primitives.name: Resource
primitives.definition: Descrittore risorsa (CPU/RAM/disk/net) with unità and limiti.

primitives.name: Quota
primitives.definition: Vincolo quantitativo applicabile (size/time/count) and verificabile.

primitives.name: Sandbox
primitives.definition: Execution boundary parametrico (fs/net/proc) ispezionabile and verificabile.

primitives.name: Capability
primitives.definition: Feature/permission runtime (can-do) distinta da authority/policy (should-do).

primitives.name: Endpoint
primitives.definition: Endpoint canonico (proto/host/port) for matching policy and logging.

primitives.name: Route
primitives.definition: Regola di instradamento/logging concettuale for traffico (debug/audit).

primitives.name: Codec
primitives.definition: Formato/codec dichiarato and versionato (json, jsonl, cbor…).

primitives.name: Seed
primitives.definition: Deterministic seed for run/replay; rende ripetibili scelte/random.

primitives.name: Provenance
primitives.definition: Lineage: come un artifact è stato prodotto (inputs→outputs) tracciabile.

primitives.name: Journal
primitives.definition: Registro append-only for operazioni critiche (txn, sealing) for diagnosi and audit.

primitives.name: Checkpoint
primitives.definition: Punto di salvataggio ripristinabile for esecuzioni lunghe (runner).

primitives.name: Diff
primitives.definition: Differenza deterministica tra due artifacts/trees/manifest.

primitives.name: Patch
primitives.definition: Applicazione controllata di una patch (solo dove permesso) with audit trail.

primitives.name: Event
primitives.definition: Recorded occurrence that enters governance evaluation; append-only.

primitives.name: Identity
primitives.definition: Stable identity di attore/componente/workload for attribuzione.

primitives.name: Authority
primitives.definition: Explicit right (scope+constraints) di tentare un Effect.

primitives.name: Contract
primitives.definition: Versioned rule: constraints + evidenze richieste; citabile.

primitives.name: Baseline
primitives.definition: Operational profile immutabile derivato da Contract (default behavior).

primitives.name: Policy
primitives.definition: Concrete rules machine-readable applicate in evaluation (materiale+hash).

primitives.name: Decision
primitives.definition: Formal result di valutazione di un Event sotto Policy+Authority.

primitives.name: Outcome
primitives.definition: Constrained class di esito: allow/deny/error.

primitives.name: ReasonCode
primitives.definition: Stable code that spiega Outcome; non muta semantica.

primitives.name: Effect
primitives.definition: Action/state-change cross-boundary (attempted/applied misurabile).

primitives.name: Evidence
primitives.definition: Curated set di artifacts that prova claims senza rerun; hashato.

primitives.name: Run
primitives.definition: Single execution that emette record and artifacts; unità indirizzabile.

primitives.name: Wave
primitives.definition: Orchestrated set di Run sotto scenario; produce publish set.

primitives.name: Bundle
primitives.definition: Portable package di policy+runs+evidence with manifest sigillato.

primitives.name: Verification
primitives.definition: Deterministic procedure offline that valida schema+hash+invarianti (PASS/FAIL).

primitives.name: Claim
primitives.definition: Affermazione verificabile pubblicata (es. 'no egress'), legata a Scope and Evidence.

primitives.name: Assertion
primitives.definition: Proposizione atomica verificata (true/false) derivata da record/metriche.

primitives.name: Control
primitives.definition: Controllo normativo that raggruppa contratti/invarianti and mappa a domini.

primitives.name: Invariant
primitives.definition: Regola sempre vera verificata su timeline/records; produce Finding.

primitives.name: Exception
primitives.definition: Eccezione esplicita a regole (scope+expiry) tracciata and verificabile.

primitives.name: Scope
primitives.definition: Perimetro di applicazione (risorse/azioni) for policy/authority/claims.

primitives.name: Finding
primitives.definition: Risultato di verifica (pass/fail/warn) referenziato a regola and prova.

primitives.name: Disclosure
primitives.definition: Dichiarazione auditabile di redazioni/omissioni and motivazioni.

primitives.name: Pack
primitives.definition: Unit installabile/versionata di domain pack (policy+trials+contracts).

primitives.name: Trial
primitives.definition: Unit eseguibile di qualifica: input → Run + records + metrics.

primitives.name: Plan
primitives.definition: Piano dichiarativo for Wave (runs, params, modes) eseguibile deterministicamente.

primitives.name: Runner
primitives.definition: Motore that esegue Trial/Plan, emette record canonici and applica validate fail-fast.
primitives.notes: Runner è 'kernel boundary': must forzare emissione and validate.

primitives.name: Emitter
primitives.definition: Materializza record/artifacts in formati v1 and li linka (refs/hashes).

primitives.name: BundleBuild
primitives.definition: Compone Bundle usando Selector+Manifest+Index+Store; produce package verificabile.

primitives.name: VerifyRunner
primitives.definition: Wrapper operativo di Verification for CI/local flows (exit codes stabili).

primitives.name: Command
primitives.definition: Unit CLI invocabile that dichiara mapping su primitive + I/O + schemas (OS surface).

primitives.name: Job
primitives.definition: Esecuzione schedulata di comandi/plan with stato and log deterministici.

primitives.name: Report
primitives.definition: Output umano+macchina derivato da artifacts verificate (index, summary).
